content.body: what's the difference between Object.[[Apply]] and Object.[[Construct]]?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: what's the difference between Object.[[Apply]] and Object.[[Construct]]?

content.body: the only observable difference I can found is though subclassing Object
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: the only observable difference I can found is though subclassing Object

content.formatted_body:
function O() {
    if (new.target) return Reflect.construct(Object, arguments, new.target);
    else return Reflect.apply(Object, this, arguments)
}

O(1) // Number { 1 }
new O(1) // O { }

Object(1) // Number { 1 }
new Object(1) // Number { 1 }

content.body:
> <@robpalme:matrix.org> Reminder:  the 19-21 July plenary meeting includes the possibility of in-person attendance in San Francisco at Google's office, but you must **register in advance** for this.  Right now there are 27 remaining places.
> 
> https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/437

Further reminder:  Please sign-up soon if you wish to attend July plenary in-person.  There are 18 remaining places.
